Title: Relates to restrictions on authority for the withholding of public monies from educational institutions
Summary: Provides that the commissioner of education may also withhold from any district or city its share of the public money of the state for willfully disobeying any provision of law, or for such decisions, orders or regulations as aforesaid whose willful violation constitutes an immediate threat to the health, safety, education or welfare of students, employees or visitors at such common school, educational institution, school district or public school.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to restrictions on authority for the withholding of public monies from educational institutions
